name: Orbit - Ludum Dare 47
description:
Your star-ship is stuck in orbit around a gravitron. Destroy the gravitron's power sources (Yellow laser heads) to escape and move on the next level. Each level gets progressively harder with stronger power sources and more enemies. Fight your way around as many gravitrons as possible to get the highest score you can.

Controls:

You cannot control your ships speed, only your direction. This is done in two ways depending on the toggle 'Use Mouse Controls'

When using Mouse controls the ship turns toward the mouse.

When not using mouse controls, use 'A' and 'D' or The left and right arrow keys to turn.

Space fires the ships guns.

PS: Use your shield (At the back of your ship) to block enemy bullets.

Orbit is an arcade style game created for Ludum Dare 47. 

The theme 'stuck in a loop' inspired the idea of being trapped in orbit around the gravitrons.
